12.title: FRANCO-BELGIAN COMIC BOOKS, STRIPS, ETC.
12.author: [No author]
notes: Original titles: Sillage 6: Artifices, and Sillage 7: Q H I.

"In Artifice, feisty human agent Navee falls on a planet persecuted by a ruling class with little regard for life. She faces her coldest rival ever. In Maximum (In)security, she is given the task of dismantling a ring trafficking in planets but to do so she must retrieve Rib'Wund, a mercenary she worked with already, out of a maximum security prison filled with ultra violent inmates. We also get to find out how she got those white bands across her body."

contents.title: TRANSLATIONS INTO ENGLISH. The Final Flight
story and dialogs by Romain Hugault & Régis Hautière

notes: "1942-1945. Humanity is living in the darkest moments of the 20th century. While the earth shudders under bombs, the sky rages with combat. Among clouds lit by crossfire, men clash and fates collide. In the solitude of their cockpits, four pilots, each among their nations' finest, set off into darkened skies."
War genre, about World War II.
